alert.note: Alert for Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 3:10AM CDT until April 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Beadle, Sanborn, Davison, Hanson, Hutchinson, Bon Homme, Yankton and Clay Counties. In Nebraska, Dixon County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Relative humidity values of 20 to 30 percent combined with the strong winds will lead to very high to extreme fire danger conditions. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
